00006 #include "DF_LatLon_Point.hpp"

00008 main(int argc, char **argv)
00009 {
00010 
00011   double dtol=10*sqrt(numeric_limits<double>::epsilon());
00012   vector<double> xyVals(2);
00013   xyVals[0]=-106.482;
00014   xyVals[1]=35.0913;
00015   cout << " Creating a point using values x=1,y=2 " << endl;
00016     
00017   DFLib::LatLon::Point myFirstPoint(xyVals);
00018   cout << " Point created. " << endl;
00019 
00020   vector<double> xyStored = myFirstPoint.getLL();
00021 
00022   cout << " Retrieved XY from stored point.  Lon = " << xyStored[0]
00023        << " Lat = " << xyStored[1];
00024 
00025   if (xyStored[0] == xyVals[0] && xyStored[1] == xyVals[1])
00026     cout << " PASSED " << endl;
00027   else
00028     cout << " FAILED " << endl;
00029 
00030   xyVals = myFirstPoint.getXY();
00031   xyVals[0] += 200;
00032   xyVals[1] += 200;
00033   cout << " Resetting XY in stored point to X=" << xyVals[0]  << ",Y= "
00034        << xyVals[1] << endl;
00035   myFirstPoint.setXY(xyVals);
00036   xyStored = myFirstPoint.getXY();
00037 
00038   cout << " Retrieved XY from stored point.  X = " << xyStored[0]
00039        << " Y = " << xyStored[1];
00040 
00041   if (xyStored[0] == xyVals[0] && xyStored[1] == xyVals[1])
00042     cout << " PASSED " << endl;
00043   else
00044   {
00045     cout << " FAILED " << endl;
00046     cout << "       storedX=" << xyStored[0] << " Should be " << xyVals[0]
00047          << endl;
00048     cout << "       storedY=" << xyStored[1] << " Should be " << xyVals[1]
00049          << endl;
00050   }
00051 
00052   xyStored = myFirstPoint.getLL();
00053   cout << " Lat Lon values of stored, modified point are " 
00054        << " Lon=" << xyStored[0]
00055        << " Lat=" << xyStored[1] << endl;
00056 
00057   cout << " Cloning point. " << endl;
00058   DFLib::LatLon::Point *mySecondPointPtr = myFirstPoint.Clone();
00059   xyStored = mySecondPointPtr->getXY();
00060 
00061   cout << " Retrieved XY from cloned point.  X = " << xyStored[0]
00062        << " Y = " << xyStored[1];
00063 
00064   if (fabs(xyStored[0]-xyVals[0])< dtol && fabs(xyStored[1]-xyVals[1])<dtol)
00065     cout << " PASSED " << endl;
00066   else
00067   {
00068     cout << " FAILED " << endl;
00069     cout << "       storedX=" << xyStored[0] << " Should be " << xyVals[0]
00070          << " difference " << xyStored[0]-xyVals[0] << endl;
00071     cout << "       storedY=" << xyStored[1] << " Should be " << xyVals[1]
00072          << " difference " << xyStored[1]-xyVals[1] << endl;
00073     cout << "       Tolerance is " << dtol << endl;
00074         
00075   }
00076         
00077   cout << " Resetting XY in cloned point to X=0,Y=1 " << endl;
00078   xyVals[0]=0;
00079   xyVals[1]=1;
00080   mySecondPointPtr->setXY(xyVals);
00081   xyStored = mySecondPointPtr->getXY();
00082 
00083   cout << " Retrieved XY from cloned point.  X = " << xyStored[0]
00084        << " Y = " << xyStored[1];
00085 
00086   if (xyStored[0] == xyVals[0] && xyStored[1] == xyVals[1])
00087     cout << " PASSED " << endl;
00088   else
00089     cout << " FAILED " << endl;
00090

00093        << " Lat = " << xyStored[1] << endl;
